reviewText: This is a wonderful video to have in your library and this would make your parties very go very nicely. It is also inspirational and is very entertaining. Great to have in the classroom for 3d arts, musical classes, and other subjects.
wonderful, unique, and entertaining for all ages. My 10 year old son has watched it several times
I had this once before, loaned it to my neighbor and got loaned out by him.....never came back.  Had to get it again.
Highly recommend this for music students/computer music enthusiasts. Kids love it because it's fun. Computer nerds enjoy it from the technical aspect. LOVE it!
ok

The package arrived in excellent condition as advertised.  My son and I have enjoyed watching the different music videos.  He has his favorites, I have mine, and it is a great way for the two of us to kick back and be lazy for a few minutes.
FUN GROOVES !!!
I loved it!!!
Like both of these videos.
A gift and they love it!
Enjoyed both the music and the animations.  The explanation was also interesting.  Can't imagine the patience and musical talent it took to put this together!

Absolutely love it! I saw this before at someone's house and fell in love with it. I just had to have one for myself. Bought one for my adult son at the same time. It is just amazing how the animation is done!!!! Just can't say enough about this.
Excellent!  Great way to encorage kids to play!

Gonna get MORE ! I just love the animation on this. SO I've got
to get the other ones also !

Fabulous.  Listen; the music alone would play well on radio.  The images are amazing!  Truly.  I'm an old-school IT guy and I'm wiped out by the beautiful, clever, wonderful animation in this body of work.  SIX stars.  Bravo!
Love this and so do my grandkids. Very enjoyable and creative!
It was interesting.

As a music teacher, I am always looking for non-traditional ways to get all students involved in music.  I wish that all loved playing  instruments or singing, but that is not the case.  I found this, and I was able to show how technology has come a long way.  We discussed technology in music and the time and precision needed to make this video. I highly recommend this and all technology in music dvd's to help teach a new generation about music.
I saw this while on a school trip several years ago and have searched for it for years. I am so glad that I found it and can watch it over and over again.
Great video and my students loved it. Lots of discussion about making the video and how real it was. We will watch again.

This by far the most amazing musical DVD in my collection. In my opinion it is brilliant.  I congratulate the composers and computer genius who put it all together. I promise I will be getting another one next month.
My 9 year old loves this DVD.  He watches it over and over and over.  It is very creative visually and musically.

Animusic is just amazing to watch. The 1st time I watched this I actually felt inspired by my fellow man....I had that type of feeling from it. The technology that goes into making this, melding with the art forms of music and animation is astoundingly fun to watch and listen to. The music is excellent, the musicianship, though computer generated is dynamic and interesting. (I'm a musician and hold a little bit of a thing against stuff like drum machines vs live performances... However in this case !) The instruments have personalities all their own. Each song is performed by different sets of instruments that play flawlessly and with character. I've played my copy for dozens of people and it is always a smash and an inspiration. Being a psychotherapist, I have used this with several of my clients to jog them into working towards something when they were down and stuck. This is classic. Bye the way, the second DVD that came out a year or so later isn't as good as this 1st one in my opinion. The 1st song on the second one is great but it falls off a bit from there. This 1st one is a must have.

I bought the Animusic 1 DVD for my 4 year old grandson who loves music and is absolutely fascinated with anything mechanical.  He was entranced watching all the instruments come to life and play the music and watched the DVD over and over until his mom had to put restrictions on how often he could watch it.  I plan on buying Animusic 2 for him for Christmas!
This is a fun music video series of rendered instruments playing the music.  The songs really sick with you and are very enjoyable.

The concept behind Animusic makes for some great work. The songs are catchy and relatively simple, but the animation they produce is mesmerizing. These are the most intricate music visualizations that I know of.
I think all pre school children should see this one its fantastic and will keep them thinking about music....kevin

I stumbled across one of the Animusic trailors at a local science museum.  Took me a while to find out what it was called, who made it etc.  Bought Animusic 1 and 2, and love both.  Well, I grew up programming 6502 and 68000 processors :)  That may tell you where my infatuation comes from... Nevertheless, highly recommended and highly amusing (both volume 1 and 2).
I saw this on PBS and had to own it. I especially liked being able to see how the animation was created, and how they linked it to the music (on the bonus material).

I bought this for my 2 year old grandson because he loves music.  We both enjoy putting the dvd in and watching the different "instruments".  I really like the more upbeat music and wish there was a little more of that.  I'm happy that I bought the dvd though...

This is a darling instrumental DVD that has some exciting new innovations in the music department.  Showing instruments that no one is playing captures your young and old audiences and overwhelms them with beautiful music and new age artistic ways.  A lovely way to teach your children about music.

Amazing computer generated graphics.  Along with the musical compositions, the entire experience is surrealistic, but very gratifying.  I'll have to pick up the second Animusic DVD when I have the chance.  Good stuff.
Purchased as a gift and the recipient loves it.
Absolutely love love love it!!!
cool DVD!! 3 ear old grandson loves to watch it!

Timeless.  Entertaining.  Enjoyable.  Mind-boggling.  Ahead of its time.  Since their is no dialogue, any audience can enjoy it even if they don't speak English or are learning.  The visual images are perfectly matched to the music.  I love it!
Animusic is ingenius.  The songs are great and the animations cute and quirky.  Great for all ages.
We really enjoyed this and just ordered the second one.
great visual and audio!

I purchased this video to use in my elementary music classes.  It is clever, and extremely well done.  Even students who are hard to keep engaged were mesmerized. I heard many "oohs and ahs" while they watched.
The DVD is a great experience.  Musicians and computer fans will love it.  Arrived when promised and in condition listed.
